20110129025155.000|20110129025204.000|CC1|WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK.            
20110129025204.000|20110129025204.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110129025204.000|20110129025206.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110129025206.000|20110129025208.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110129025208.000|20110129025210.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110129025210.000|20110129025210.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110129025210.000|20110129025212.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110129025212.000|20110129025212.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110129025212.000|20110129025214.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110129025214.000|20110129025214.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110129025214.000|20110129025217.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110129025217.000|20110129025218.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110129025218.000|20110129025218.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110129025218.000|20110129025220.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110129025220.000|20110129025220.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110129025220.000|20110129025223.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110129025223.000|20110129025223.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110129025223.000|20110129025225.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110129025225.000|20110129025225.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110129025225.000|20110129025228.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110129025228.000|20110129025228.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110129025228.000|20110129025230.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110129025230.000|20110129025230.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110129025230.000|20110129025231.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110129025231.000|20110129025233.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110129025233.000|20110129025233.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110129025233.000|20110129025235.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110129025235.000|20110129025235.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110129025235.000|20110129025237.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110129025237.000|20110129025238.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110129025238.000|20110129025238.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110129025238.000|20110129025241.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110129025241.000|20110129025241.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110129025241.000|20110129025243.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110129025243.000|20110129025243.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110129025243.000|20110129025245.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110129025245.000|20110129025246.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110129025246.000|20110129025246.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110129025246.000|20110129025249.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110129025249.000|20110129025249.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110129025249.000|20110129025251.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110129025251.000|20110129025251.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110129025251.000|20110129025253.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110129025253.000|20110129025253.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:52:00 of 1:00:00
20110129025253.000|20110129025253.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110129025253.000|20110129025255.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110129025255.000|20110129025255.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110129025255.000|20110129025257.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110129025257.000|20110129025257.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110129025257.000|20110129025300.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,
